chapter.text: That third choice always existed. ^1500The choice to just not choose was always there, but you all wanted to further the story. ^1500Why? ^1500Iâ€™m sure you all had your reasoning. ^1500Some maybe hoped that you could choose the right path, and find the best ending for whoever you were choosing for, and maybe some of you just want to see how deep the rabbit hole could go. ^1500I thank you for that. ^1500I thank you for choosing.
